blogPost.title: U.S. Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg speaks with WSJ’s @catherine_lucey at #WSJCEOCouncil https://t.co/DJ68z02nZG
blogPost.author: The Wall Street Journal

localize.full_text: ピート・バティジエッグ運輸長官がWSJの @catherine_lucey と #WSJCEOCouncil https://t.co/DJ68z02nZG で対談。
美国交通部长Pete Buttigieg在#WSJCEOCouncil https://t.co/DJ68z02nZG 上与WSJ的@catherine_lucey交谈。
美國交通部長Pete Buttigieg在#WSJCEOCouncil https://t.co/DJ68z02nZG 上與WSJ的@catherine_lucey交談。

previous.title: Tesla and SpaceX founder Elon Musk speaks with WSJ’s @JoannaStern at #WSJCEOCouncil https://t.co/OiyO7UJuMz https://t.co/0xUmYBJH9b

localize.full_text: TeslaとSpaceXの創業者であるイーロン・マスク氏が、WSJの@JoannaStern氏と話す#WSJCEOCouncil https://t.co/OiyO7UJuMz https://t.co/0xUmYBJH9b
特斯拉和SpaceX创始人埃隆-马斯克在#WSJCECouncil https://t.co/OiyO7UJuMz https://t.co/0xUmYBJH9b 与WSJ的@JoannaStern对话。
特斯拉和SpaceX創始人埃隆-馬斯克在#WSJCECouncil https://t.co/OiyO7UJuMz https://t.co/0xUmYBJH9b 與WSJ的@JoannaStern對話。

next.title: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky speaks with WSJ Editor in Chief Matt Murray at the #WSJCEOCouncil Summit https://t.co/H4pQt814Bu

乌克兰总统沃洛季米尔-泽伦斯基在#WSJCECouncil峰会上与WSJ主编马特-默里交谈 https://t.co/H4pQt814Bu
烏克蘭總統沃洛季米爾-澤倫斯基在#WSJCECouncil峯會上與WSJ主編馬特-默裏交談 https://t.co/H4pQt814Bu
